title: Services
content:
Services

Caritor Solutions offers end-to-end solutions and services of Oracle ERP Cloud and on premise suite applications. We provide system consulting, implementation, upgradations and migrations along with worldwide roll-outs, change management, Financial Planning and Budgeting coupled with best-in-class Post ERP Implementation Support and Maintenance.
